alert.note: Alert for Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 5:21PM CDT until June 05 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN POINSETT...SOUTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI...NORTHEASTERN CRITTENDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN TIPTON COUNTIES... At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gilmore, or 7 miles southeast of Tyronza, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Tyronza, Joiner, Gilmore, Turrell, Clarkedale, Birdsong, Whitton, Dimple, Deckerville, St Thomas, Menesha, Beasley, Lambethville, Dub, Stacy, McClendons Corner, Spear Lake, Chelford and Galilee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
